categories: Category:Events of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Project Ambition was the codename of Ysanne Isard's plan to liquidate the Cabal which opposed the Imperial Ruling Council and dispose of Sate Pestage, which would give her complete control of the Empire's remnants, following the Battle of Endor. She accomplished this by dividing Pestage and the Cabal (both physically and in terms of suspicions of allegiance), notably through the bumbling of the Battle of Brentaal and by undermining the Cabal's support throughout the Imperial Military.
